changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE PROCEDURE CrashDump.DeleteCrashReportsOlderThan @MaxAgeInDays int = 21 AS BEGIN
DECLARE @CurrentTimeStamp dateTime
SET @CurrentTimeStamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
DELETE FROM CrashDump.CrashReports WHERE DATEDIFF(day, DateAdded, @CurrentTimeStamp) > @MaxAgeInDays
END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON CrashDump.DeleteCrashReportsOlderThan TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON CrashDump.DeleteCrashReportsOlderThan FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE CrashDump.DeleteCrashReportsOlderThan;
